title: HWT 4BAT/6/40000005 error
message: Anyone knows what this issue is? When I test customers Mac all working fine but he said before it rebooted and show a cross instead of percentage "no battery" after SMC and PRAM worked again. After that randomly shuts down. Anyidea?

title: HWT 4BAT/6/40000005 error
message: Probabily a dodgy battery or even SMC data lines, crud under SMC. need more info.
